title: Global industrial robot market : key companies by related revenue 2017
yAxis: Industrial robot revenue in million euros
summary: This statistic shows the distribution of total assets within the whole banking system on the united kingdom ( uk ) market as of 2014 . total assets is one of the main measures of a bank 's prosperity , and is defined as all assets owned by a bank . This includes , but is not limited to ; cash and balances , loans and advances to banks and customers , as well as debt securities .
